description: Deploy a number of Windows Server 2016 Core VMs into an availability set, adds the Role DNS, and configures DNS forwarding. All nodes share the same set of DNS forwarding rules.
summary: Deploy a VM availability set with a given number of Windows Server 2016 Core machines. Each machine has the Role DNS installed, and DNS forwarding set to a prescribed IP address (or list of IP addresses). Deployment is carried out to an existing VNet.
